Energy fraction in b-jets coming from B-hadron

Jul 20, 2017

Fully hadronic decay

)

ppzhvvbb events

ppzgvvbb events

Semi-leptonic decay

)

ppzhvvbb events

Conclusion :

  • Pull angle distribution largely rely on the jet size
  • The more energy not coming from the B-hadron, the less the two jets look to be connected (sub-leading jet R=1.0 at low Bhadron/Bjet pT)
  • [ ] When Bhadron/Bjet pT above 1, pull angle look to show a good connection, but there is the same pattern close to 0 â€¦ )
